name: The Culinary Institute of Montana at Flathead Valley Community College
description: Offers an Associate of Applied Science degree in Culinary Arts, focusing on hands-on training in culinary techniques, baking, pastry arts, and restaurant management. Students gain practical experience through internships and work in the school's on-campus restaurant
services: Catholic-owned Culinary training in Montana consultation

name: University of Montana - Missoula College
description: Offers a Certificate of Applied Science in Culinary Arts and an AAS Degree in Food Service Management through its Big Sky Culinary Institute. The program provides hands-on training and supportive courses for a successful career in the hospitality and food service industry
services: Catholic-owned Culinary training in Montana consultation

name: Helena College University of Montana
description: Offers a Certificate in Culinary Arts that provides hands-on training in food preparation, culinary techniques, and baking, covering food safety and sanitation
